text: Is this 1.6-rc1?
It is <@U8MPCDJAY>

Here is the step by step of what I did with this:

1. `git clone <https://github.com/TheCedarPrince/JAnki.jl.git>`
2. Navigate to Janki.jl and execute Julia REPL then `activate .`
3. Then `instantiate .`
4. `precompile`
Doesn't show errors. Thoughts?
